com.watr.app.utils

Class TimeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.watr.app.utils.TimeUtils

  • public class TimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities centered around dealing with logically complex time evaluations.

      • getUnixTimestampDiff

        public static long getUnixTimestampDiff(long start,
                                        long end)
        Get the absolute difference between two Unix timestamps in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        start - Long Timestamp to start the interval being measured
        end - Long Timestamp to end the interval being measured
        Returns:
        Long The difference between the two timestamps in milliseconds.

      • localTimeToUnixTimestamp

        public static long localTimeToUnixTimestamp(@NonNull
                                            @NonNull java.time.LocalTime relativeTime)
        Converts a LocalTime object to a Unix timestamp within the current date. Accuracy depends on the accuracy of the return value of ZoneId.systemDefault(), which in turn depends on the accuracy of the return value of TimeZone.getDefault().
        Parameters:
        relativeTime - LocalTime LocalTime instance to extract Unix timestamp from
        Returns:
        Long Unix timestamp

      • localTimeToUnixTimestamp

        public static long localTimeToUnixTimestamp(@NonNull
                                            @NonNull java.time.LocalTime relativeTime,
                                            @NonNull
                                            @NonNull DateOffset dateOffset)
        Same as TimeUtils.localTimeToUnixTimestamp(), but takes a date offset to allow calculation across date boundaries.
        Parameters:
        relativeTime - LocalTime LocalTime instance to extract Unix timestamp from
        dateOffset - DateOffset
        Returns:
        Long Unix timestamp

        public static boolean currentTimeIsBefore(java.time.LocalTime comparisonTime)
        Checks if the current time is before a time today.
        Parameters:
        comparisonTime - LocalTime LocalTime instance to compare
        Returns:
        Boolean Whether the current time is before the provided time today

      • currentTimeIsInInterval

        public static boolean currentTimeIsInInterval(java.time.LocalTime start,
                                              java.time.LocalTime end)
        Checks if current time is between two LocalTime instances, i.e. in their interval.
        Parameters:
        start - LocalTime Interval-starting LocalTime instance
        end - LocalTime Interval-ending LocalTime instance
        Returns:
        Boolean Whether current time is between the provided LocalTime instances

      • currentTimeIsInterval

        public static boolean currentTimeIsInterval(@NonNull
                                            @NonNull java.time.LocalTime start,
                                            @NonNull
                                            @NonNull DateOffset startOffset,
                                            @NonNull
                                            @NonNull java.time.LocalTime end,
                                            @NonNull
                                            @NonNull DateOffset endOffset)
        Same as TimeUtils.currentTimeIsInInterval(), but takes start and end date offsets to allow calculation across date boundaries.
        Parameters:
        start - LocalTime Interval-starting LocalTime instance
        startOffset - DateOffset DateOffset enum for the start of the interval
        end - LocalTime Interval-ending LocalTime instance
        endOffset - DateOffset DateOffset enum for the end of the interval
        Returns:
        Boolean Whether current time is between the provided LocalTime instances
